body_html:
Thanks @asimshankar, it worked with the corresponding path for the archlinux cuda package directory layout: https://www.archlinux.org/packages/community/x86_64/cuda/

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

I guess it is advisable to add this to ~/.bashrc
